content: Yes, the Marlborough Wine & Brew Tours is a great option for those who are interested in exploring the wine and beer scene of Marlborough. This tour starts in the morning and lasts for about 8 hours, and includes visits to four wineries and a craft beer brewery. Some of the popular wineries that the tour visits include Cloudy Bay, Wairau River Wines, Allan Scott Family Winemakers, and Saint Clair Family Estate. The tour includes tastings of wine and beer, and lunch is also provided. Many reviewers have praised the knowledgeable and friendly tour guides, as well as the variety of wineries and beer breweries visited on the tour. It is a great way to experience the best of both worlds in Marlborough and learn more about the region's wine and craft beer scene.
